title: Riding it Out
description: This beginning of this book was originally released in an anthology called AMERICAN HONEY, THE STORM, that is no longer available.Riding it Out is the whole story told in two parts.The Storm.The Hurricane.One womanOne manAn empty bed and breakfastA summer stormOne night they'll never forgetCan two strangers find happiness in each other, or will past secrets make it impossible?
author: Jennifer Foor
